pages.text: This rite calls upon deeper powers of the $(ml:goo/hastur)Yellow King to infuse a $(item)Painting$() with his powers, transforming it into an $(item)Enchanted Canvas$().$(br2)An Enchanted Canvas is placed much like a normal painting; however, each motive comes with distinct powers.$(br)Note that all of the following motives can be placed cosmetically using a normal Painting.
Up to three Enchanted Canvases may be fabricated at the same time.
This inconspicuous painting will sic a ferocious $(marked)Guard Dog$() on any unwanted intruder that crosses it.
This cozy painting invokes a deep feeling of homeliness upon its owner, keeping them in good health and well-nourished.
This painting depicts a strange, surreal landscape, and will send a magic pulse out at those who look upon it. It will not affect its owner.
This austere painting bars intruders from entering the area uninvited.
